alert.note: Alert for Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 1:47PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Juab... west central Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 147 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Vernon, or 27 miles west of Payson, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elberta, Utah Lake, Genola, Eureka and Lofgreen. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 138 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
